column4: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A young------ Filipino woman died after she crashed her motorcycle into a brick wall at 11:35 am on March 4
column9: Phnom Penh.------The victim was named as MARASIGAN MORESETTE ACERO
column11: a teacher at WESTLINE EDUCATION GROUP.------According to sources at the scene

column1: pair of thieves who had stolen her property when she crashed at high speed.------After the incident
